DOC.detailed_description: It estimate 1 billion people worldwide vitamin D deficiency insufficiency . It well know vitamin D deficiency cause osteoporosis , increase risk fracture cause muscle weakness . But evidence calcium malnutrition hypovitaminosis D predispose condition various common chronic disease malignancy ( particularly colon , breast prostate ) chronic inflammatory autoimmune disease ( inflammatory bowel disease , multiple sclerosis ) well metabolic disorder ( metabolic syndrome , hypertension ) . It also report vitamin D deficiency may predispose glucose intolerance , alter insulin secretion type 2 diabetes mellitus . The purpose study determine vitamin D status among type 2 diabetic outpatient clinic examine relationship vitamin D status , calcium phosphorous metabolism , inflammatory marker , glycemic control , blood pressure lipid profile . Moreover patient ask answer questionnaire regard lifestyle , exercise , sun exposure food intake .
